_header: A dear God what may this be / That all thing wears
_description: On the Death of Edward III — fourteen 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘Selden seiȝe and sone forȝete’

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
A dere God what man þis beþat alle þing weres &
                    wasteþ awai…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And nou heore los biginneþ to swageþat selde I
                    seȝe is sone forȝete

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
A dere God what may þis beÞat alle þing weres &
                    wasteþ a way…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And nou heore los beginneþ to swageÞat selde I
                    seiȝe is sone for ȝe
